content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I’m here to get you scheduled for your HVAC needs. May I start by getting your name, please?
Thank you, Sarah! Could you please provide your address so we can confirm service availability in your area?
Thanks! We serve 127 Westlake Ave. Could you tell me a little more about your HVAC issue and what time would be best for a technician to come by?
The AC isn’t cooling well. Tomorrow morning is best if you have it.
Got it—a technician for your underperforming AC, ideally tomorrow morning. Let me check our calendar quickly to confirm.
I’m sorry, I’m having trouble accessing the schedule right now. Let me get a team member to help confirm your booking.
Hi Sarah, this is Joe from XYZ Home Services. I’ll check the calendar now and confirm for tomorrow morning. Please hold on a moment.
Sarah, we have an opening tomorrow between 8-11am. Does that work for you? Please let me know so I can reserve it for you.
Yes, that works. Please book it.
Appointment is booked for tomorrow between 8-11am at 127 Westlake Ave for your AC issue. You’ll get a reminder before our tech arrives. Thanks for choosing XYZ!
